file.path: D:\TorrentDir\Haruki Murakami E-Book Collection\Blind Willow, Sleeping Woman (and Other Stories).epub
file.name: Blind Willow, Sleeping Woman (and Other Stories).epub

tika.dc.description: Here are animated crows, a criminal monkey, and an iceman, as well as the dreams that shape us and the things we might wish for. Whether during a chance reunion in Italy, a romantic exile in Greece, a holiday in Hawaii, or in the grip of everyday life, Murakami's characters confront grievous loss, or sexuality, or the glow of a firefly, or the impossible distances between those who ought to be the closest of all.
